author: Special Correspondent
text:
: A. Khammar Basha (57), Chief Judicial Magistrate of Tirunelveli district, was killed when the car by which he was travelling overturned at Kakkavadi near here on Saturday. The incident happened when the driver of the car lost control, after the vehicle hit a road median, police said. Mr. Basha was proceeding to Erode. He was rushed to a private hospital but succumbed to the injuries.

Lakshmanan, car driver, and Velayutham, an assistant, escaped unhurt. The Velliyanai police have registered a case.
title: CJM killed
